#labels Featured
== Future Project Ideas ==

There are many programs that need to be written for Symbian. Some ideas that come to mind are:

  * An [ImageStitching image stitching] program
  * [SubwayFinder Subway Finder] using GPS and compass
  * [InstantMessenger IM client] for MSN, ICQ, AIM etc.
  * iPhoneish SMS [BubbleChat bubble chat]
  * [EBookReader E-book reader]
  * [MediaPlayer A decent media player]
  * [SMSLauncher SMS launcher] that reacts to incoming messages
